attributes.action: Allow british people to give refuge to syrian children in our homes urgently
attributes.background: As a british mother we need to show more compassion to the desperate mothers in syria.. no child should end up washed ashore just for simply trying to survive. I for one would welcome any syrian refugee in to my home to give them normality in such a terrible circumstance.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106997

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
